data: If you follow these instructions, do you return to the starting point? Always face forward. Take 9 steps left. Take 10 steps forward. Take 9 steps right. Take 10 steps backward. Options: - Yes - No Let’ s think step by step.

If you always face forward, you always go forward. If you always face left, you always go left. If you always face right, you always go right. If you always take 10 steps forward and 10 steps backward, you always go forward. In order to always return to the starting point, you always walk forward. The walking instructions state take 9 steps left, take 10 steps forward, take 9 steps right. So, the answer is yes.
